full_output.summary: I am actively seeking an opportunity within a reputable organization where I can apply and augment my technical skills, gain practical experience, foster personal and professional growth as an independent woman, and contribute meaningfully to the company's advancement. I am particularly interested in a role that allows me to work on real-world projects, collaborate with experienced professionals, and continue to expand my knowledge in the dynamic and challenging technical sector.

projects.name: Div and Pay
projects.description: This Project is about Bill Spliting within the group of people.

projects.description: This Project is about a game used to challenge our memory.

projects.description: A memory-challenging game made using Arduino Uno and LEDs to engage participants.

projects.name: Binary Loop and DiceLit

projects.name: DIceLit

experiences.description: Explored signalling and telecommunication systems. Studied about the systems used to communicate among the stations.
Contributed in a renowned NGO which helps underprivileged children from lower-class backgrounds. Volunteered as a social media marketing team member, managing the online platforms of the foundation.

full_output.name: AKANKSHA GUPTA
achievements_and_awards: WINNER OF GAME-O-MANIA EVENT & CORE TEAM MEMBER AT SHARK TANK EVENT Secured 1st prize for my self-designed IoT Memory Game, outshining competitors by selling highest tickets solely for my game. Simultaneously, Managed and Organized the Shark Tank event, ensuring its successful execution during SANCHAAR, the in-house Tech Fest.
